data.title: Great Flavor
data.text: My friend and I tried two Korean dishes and really like them. They have Japanese cuisine as well. Would definitely return. Don't let the outside fool you. The food is great inside.

data.title: Not quite as expected.
data.text: Given the few reviews here, I expected something amazing. Did not expect a fast food joint. The food was good, service good. All a bit vague, and a bit of a communication problem. Next time I think I'll choose a sit down restaurant.

data.title: Amazing Food & Owners!
data.text: This building used to be a Taco Bell, now it's inhabited by these wonderful Japenese owners...who are the happiest people on earth! They make you smile, they laugh with you, they remember you if you live there and what you order!  They care!  Their food is really good...(tempura freak here...and I totally enjoyed)...they have it all!  Even Sake!  Check it out if you are looking for something different!  And try to really make the owners laugh!  It's contagious!

data.title: Cute looking Mom & Pop joint
data.text:
This looked like it was definitely run by family.

Ordered the teriyaki chicken bowl.  Generous portion of rice & chicken with cabbage, carrots & broccoli.  Good sized portion for $7 something.

Chicken was cooked well and teriyaki was great! They also put some extra teriyaki for your rice and mixed with everything it's really good.

Went during late lunch time, place wasn't too crowded when we went in but it was delicious. Will go again the next time in town.

data.title: I was WOWED!
data.text: First let me state the man at the counter was AMAZING, he was genuine, happy to serve you, and wanted you to fully enjoy your meal, the service will be the reason we choose this place again, the food was GREAT, and the portions were large, the dishes were served with pride, and he came out to show you how to MIX one of the "bowls"  it was seasoned perfectly, I cant say enough good things about this place, I wish I lived in Chico just to keep eating here!

data.title: Good food
data.text: I liked the thai chicken combination plate. They have good service and good food. Nothing fancy, but definitely good food
